snippet: If employers are no longer on the hook for the health insurance costs of their employees, older job candidates - who consume more health care - may start to look more attractive.
abstract: If employers are no longer on the hook for the health insurance costs of their employees, older job candidates - who consume more health care - may start to look more attractive.

headline.main: Older Workers Could Benefit if Companies Drop Insurance

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
